purpose: Provide a platform for hosting and managing open-source AI agents that can be integrated into various applications.
principle: Built using Python, the platform allows the deployment and orchestration of AI agents using a modular architecture.
reusability: The platform supports integration through REST APIs, allowing users to deploy custom agents and manage them in an orchestrated environment.
limitations: The platform is currently in alpha, with potential stability and feature limitations. It may require further development for production use.
name: ottomator-agents
description: All the open source AI Agents hosted on the oTTomator Live Agent Studio platform!
highlight: Modular architecture for deploying and managing multiple AI agents in a coordinated environment.
